definition: micro (computer)
surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
tiny/miniature/slightly/profound/abtruse/to decline/one millionth part of/micro-/Taiwan pr. [wei2]
machine/engine/opportunity/intention/aircraft/pivot/crucial point/flexible (quick-witted)/organic/CL:臺|台[tai2]
surname Ji
miniaturization/micro-miniaturization

sentences.english: The machine is controlled by micro-computer, and it adopts stepping motor to feed materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機採用微機電腦控制，步進電機拖料。

sentences.english: This article deals with automatic entry method of microcomputer business accounting system.
sentences.chinese: 本文詳細介紹了微機商業會計自動化分錄登帳方法。

sentences.english: Make use of campus services like the health center and computer labs.
sentences.chinese: 利用好校園的各種服務，比如校園醫護中心和微機房。

sentences.english: Microcomputer system of spinning-machine is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了紡絲機微機控制系統的研製。

sentences.english: You have to take off your shoes before getting into the computer room.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，在進入微機室之前，你得先把你的鞋子脫掉。

sentences.english: PC-based or stand-alone motion controllers for two, four, six or eight axes.
sentences.chinese: 微機或單機運動控制器爲兩，四，六，八軸。

sentences.english: The track like data structure which resembles the track layouts in stations, is an important part of a PC based interlocking software system.
sentences.chinese: 站場形數據結構是微機聯鎖軟件系統的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: At present, because of the application of computer, the performance of torque measuring instrument has been improved greatly.
sentences.chinese: 目前，由於微機的應用，轉矩測量儀性能大大提高。

sentences.english: The computer room can hold 70 students.
A new microcomputerized Fetal Electrocardiograph (FECG) is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹一種微機化胎兒心電圖儀。

sentences.english: This method can be used in other kind of micro- processor based systems.
sentences.chinese: 可以推廣應用於其它類型的微機系統中。

sentences.english: This paper describes the fundamentals of inspecting the wiper permanent magnet motors by the aid of microcomputer.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了刮水器永磁電機微機檢測的基本原理。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a fully computerized cardiac programmable stimulator .
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種全微機化的程控心臟刺激儀系統。

sentences.english: Traditional manual meter reading will be replaced by the computer remote concentrated meter reading.
sentences.chinese: 微機遠程集中抄表正逐漸替代傳統的人工抄表。

sentences.english: The program for computer to calculate the formulation was given.
sentences.chinese: 列舉了微機計算色漆配方的程序。

sentences.english: She would sit in the computer lab at her university and we'd talk into the early morning.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在她的大學的微機室，和我聊天直到淩晨。

definition: class meeting (in schools)
to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to mention/to bring up (a subject)/with regard to/as for
probability (math.)
to return good for evil (idiom)/to requite evil with good
to write from memory
overtones in conversation/things indirectly implied from what is said
vocational high school (abbr. for 職業高中|职业高中[zhi2 ye4 gao1 zhong1])
to make a fool of oneself
to ask a question, already knowing the answer
to think highly of oneself
comic monologue/one-person comic sketch
(of a lazy or incompetent teacher) to hamper students' progress/(of media) to propagate errors/to lead people astray
sexology
(slang) to target an intoxicated person for sexual assault
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
